member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.AudioTrack
member.summary: A Timeline track that can play s.

summary.para: Asset that generates playables for controlling time-related elements on a GameObject.
This playable optionally controls , s and Activation from a GameObject. Users can also specify a Prefab that will be instantiated, and parented to the the sourceObject if specified.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.ControlTrack
member.summary: A Track whose clips control time-related elements on a GameObject.

summary.para: Playable used to control other PlayableDirectors.
This playable is used to control other PlayableDirector components from a Timeline sequence.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.GroupTrack
member.summary: A group track is a container that allows tracks to be arranged in a hierarchical manner.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.ParticleControlPlayable
member.summary: Playable that synchronizes a particle system simulation.

summary.para: A PlayableTrack is a track whose clips are custom playables.
This is a track that can contain s that are found in the project and do not have their own specified track type.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.PrefabControlPlayable
member.summary: Playable that controls and instantiates a Prefab.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.IPropertyCollector
member.summary: Interface used to inform the Timeline Editor about potential property modifications that may occur while previewing.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.IPropertyPreview
member.summary: Implement this interface in a to specify which properties will be modified when Timeline is in preview mode.

summary.para: Interface that can be implemented by MonoBehaviours indicating that they receive time-related control calls from a PlayableGraph.
Implementing this interface on MonoBehaviours attached to GameObjects under control by control-tracks will cause them to be notified when associated Timeline clips are active.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.ITimelineClipAsset
member.summary: Implement this interface to support advanced features of timeline clips.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.ClipCaps
member.summary: Describes the timeline features supported by clips representing this playable.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.NotKeyableAttribute
member.summary: Attribute to apply to a ScriptPlayable class or property to indicate that it is not animatable.

summary.para: Specifies the type of object that should be bound to a TrackAsset.
Use this attribute when creating Custom Tracks to specify the type of object the track requires a binding to.
Specifies the type of or ScriptPlayables that this track can create clips representing.
This is required for custom track assets to specify the type of clips to create.

member.name: T:UnityEngine.Timeline.TrackColorAttribute
member.summary: Attribute used to specify the color of the track and its clips inside the Timeline Editor.

summary.para: Lets the underlying asset handle extrapolated time values.

summary.para: Returns the the number of output tracks in the Timeline.
An output track is a track the generates a PlayableOutput. In general, an output track is any track that is not a , a subtrack, or override track.
Returns the number of tracks at the root level of the timeline.
A root track refers to all tracks that occur at the root of the timeline. These are the outmost level s, and output tracks that do not belong to any group.

summary.para: Specifies whether to apply track root motion offsets to all clips on the track.
This can be used to offset all clips on a track, in addition to the clips individual root motion offsets.
Specifies an to be applied.
Applying an to an animation track will allow discarding portions of the animation being applied on the track.
